message: Consolidated duplicate service control logic into a single module and updated dependencies.

key_changes: Added pgrep-based status fallback with process patterns
Introduced aliases for legacy service IDs (param_ui->parameter_ui, plc_tester->plc_tester_ui, plc_debug->plc_debug_ui, main_service->ald_core)
Extended SERVICES registry with process patterns and fallback commands for UI apps
Restart now accepts env overrides for parity with start
data.backward_compatibility: Pages already used service_controller; ald_service_manager is migrated; alias mapping covers legacy keys if any remain elsewhere.
